snippet: President Obama on Friday appointed a new White House adviser and charged her with overseeing the execution of major policies like health care, underscoring the growing concern in the West Wing about political problems that have arisen because of...
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Friday appointed a new White House adviser and charged her with overseeing the execution of major policies like health care, underscoring the growing concern in the West Wing about political problems that have arisen because of poor follow-through.

headline.main: Obama Names Adviser With Broad Portfolio
headline.print_headline: Obama Names Adviser With Broad Portfolio
